No in-game sound at all.

In this gripping tale, you play one of four survivors with a unique personality quirk with three other survivors, and struggle to learn the values of Paracetamol, Aspirin and First Aid in a bleak world where an evil AI Director has engineered the apocalypse to suit its own demands.

It's up to you to lead your motley crew to safety as you journey across the Eastern Seaboard, with Zombies waiting to attack you at every turn, and the AI Director unleashing hell every time it gets annoyed with your progress (or lack thereof).

An old Vietnam vet, a biker, an angsty teenager, and a store manager grab some peelz and some guns and shoot their way through a crowd of undead people.
Uno de los juegos multijugador que mÃ¡s risas y buenos ratos me han hecho pasar. Imprescindible sin duda como juego de zombies, como shooter y como multiplayer para echar horas con los amigos

This game is quite fun for a game made in 2007. The fact that it's made in 2007 also means that someone with an older PC like me can run it fairly smoothly. I had a lot of fun playing this version over the sequel. Likely because this version is a lot more simpler but still fun. The community servers also made it extremely fun as you can grind out achivements, build around you (like Fortnite) or just hang with friends. Overall, if you're thinking of buying this game, it's pretty dirt cheap for the amount of time you can spend in it.
Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¿
PILLS!

Here's a little story, one day I was just sitting down casually playing Left 4 Dead until I got into a lobby that had 2 elitists and 1 noob. 10 minutes into the gameplay, I accidently shot one of my teamates(one of the elitist) and I apologized for shooting him. In return, he kills me and spawn traps me continuously until he died. The level restarted and I brought it upon myself to get revenge. I killed him, him and his friend decides to kick me just for simply getting revenge. If you ever run into these type of people just report them and leave. Overall the game is pretty damn good. The community is "eh" it has good sports and bad sports.
I rate this game 8/10

I haven't played this game for very long; but the few hours I have played so far, have been amazing! Before getting this game on Steam; I have played the second game for a few hours at some friends' houses. I would recommend getting this game first to get you started. But I think if you already have the second game, or just really familiar with the series, don't get this game (unless you're a big fan of L4D.) Although the first game is really fun, it has less to offer than the second game.
